None.Name: Mana Stream
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit casts a ray of mana that deals 60 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 90 in total.

None.Name: Blink
None.Description: Activate to teleport to an own ground unit within a 50m range. Reusable every 10 seconds.
